body_html:
The parsing looks good.

I'm a bit concerned about the change though...we don't allow requires_grad in Tensor.numpy, but we allow it (and in fact put it as part of the factory) in from_numpy?
body_text:
The parsing looks good.
I'm a bit concerned about the change though...we don't allow requires_grad in Tensor.numpy, but we allow it (and in fact put it as part of the factory) in from_numpy?
body:
The parsing looks good.

I'm a bit concerned about the change though...we don't allow requires_grad in `Tensor.numpy`, but we allow it (and in fact put it as part of the factory) in `from_numpy`?
